TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Muggsy_Bogues, title = Muggsy_Bogues, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muggsy_Bogues} }

S.FORM: == Muggsy Bogues == Muggsy Bogues sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1965, ryax sa tay 9 nqu tay 1, Muggsy Bogues, squliq na p'unro. Jim Belushi, t'aring kawas tay 1983 tehuk kawas tay 1987, mqwas biru sa Wake Forest pqwsan biru krahu. Maki sa kawas 2014 lga mhngaw ini ptzyuwaw la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players

== Moggsy Bogoes == Moggsy Bogoes sraral hya'ga sisyow na NBA, wal malaxmisoq qaniy la. kawas tay 1965, ryax sa tay 9 nqo tay 1, Moggsy Bogoes, sqoliq na p'onro. Jim Beloshi, t'aring kawas tay 1983 tehok kawas tay 1987, mqwas biro sa Wake Forest pqwsan biro kraho. Maki sa kawas 2014 lga mhngaw ini ptzyowaw la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players
